publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 140
ab.l: Qutḥarɣyn ḿeni e H jaman adamdan avančy kišid́ań abraɣyn ḿeni.
Ki saɣyš et́adirĺar jerińči saɣyš ič́ĺarińd́a har ḱuń yštyryladyrlar č́eriv́ǵa.
Bilejdirĺar tiĺĺariń ylan kibik uvu kibik azdaɣanyn erińĺari t́ub́uńa hamḿeš́a.
Saqlaɣyn ḿeni e H qolundan rašaʿnyn avančy kišid́ań ab- raɣyn ḿeni ki saɣyš et́tiĺar azaštyrma atlamlarymny.
Ḱoḿd́u- ĺar ökt́amĺar tuzaḥ maja da avlamaḥlar jajdylar av jiź qatyna tuzaḥlar qojdular maja.
Ajtamyn H-ɣa Teńrim śeń qulaḥ salɣyn e H avazyna jalbarmaḥlarymnyn.
Teńrim H quvatym da jarlyɣašym qaplap tuttuj bašymny uruš ḱuńuńd́a.
B́erḿagiń e H ḿeni ḱuśańč́ĺarińa rašaʿnyn saɣyšyn čyɣarmaɣyn jaryḥqa ḱot́u- ŕuĺḿasińĺar hamḿeš́a.
Uvu quršavčularymnyn öḿǵagi erińĺari- niń japḥej alarny.
Salsynlar alar üśt́uńa ḱoḿurĺar otḥa t́uš́urǵuń alarny t́eŕań ǯuɣurlarɣa ki turalmagejlar.
Jalɣan śoźu kišiniń t́uźuĺḿagej jerd́a avančy kiši da jaman avlaɣyn any śu- ŕuńḿakĺarǵa.
Biĺamiń ki qylar H jarɣusun miśkińniń t́oŕasiń miś-
